title: Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol 100mg | The Healthy Place
description: Need an energy boost to help with stress? Try Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol, one of the best antioxidant supplements for more energy and less stress!
cleaned_text: Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol 100mg [Dr. Mercola](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/brand/dr-mercola/) Full Price 2 in stock 30 capsules Need an energy boost to help with stress? Try Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol, one of the best antioxidant supplements for more energy and less stress! - Increases antioxidant capacity* - Naturally increases energy levels* - Strengthens cellular health* - Protects against oxidative stress* - Supports heart, brain, muscles, and immune function* - Contains fish (tilapia) - Non-GMO - Does not contain gluten, soy Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol 100mg If your goal is to be the healthiest you, then this [antioxidant supplement](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/supplements/antioxidants/) is made for you! If you want to fight oxidative stress, slow down cellular aging, or maintain optimal energy levels, then you should listen up too! After you've blown out thirty candles on your birthday cake, a gradual shift occurs in your body. The mitochondria (powerhouse) in your cells don't produce energy as efficiently and your antioxidant capacity begins to shrink. Here's what's happening: Once upon a time, your body was happily minding its own business keeping you healthy. You fueled your body with food, which was transported to your cell's mitochondria and converted into energy. Then your mitochondria began to slow down their production and produce more waste. Slowly your body had less energy as it gained extra oxidative stress. Is there a happy ending to this story? Yes! Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol is like a hero who will save your mitochondria and slay the dragon of oxidative stress! You can thank your mitochondria for supplying your body with an endless stream of energy. That's why it's so important to keep them in tip-top shape with a nourishing [antioxidant supplement](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/supplements/antioxidants/). Ubiquinol, the active form of coenzyme Q10 (CoQ10), is just the one for the job! The health benefits of this antioxidant-rich supplement range from your cells to your skin and everything in between: - Protects your body from oxidative stress* - Supports optimal energy production* - Promotes the health of brain, nerves, kidneys, and muscles* - Aids heart function and reduces the risk of cardiovascular diseases* - Boosts energy levels, stamina, and endurance* - Increases immune function* - Helps maintain already-healthy blood pressure levels* - Encourages a healthy response to stress* - Is not a stimulant* Science suggests that having more CoQ10 in your body equals healthier cells and happier mitochondria. Thankfully ubiquinol is the more bioavailable form on CoQ10! Your body must convert CoQ10 into ubiquinol, so taking ubiquinol is less work for your body. Plus, ubiquinol is better absorbed than CoQ10, especially for individuals over the age of 30.* [Antioxidant supplements](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/supplements/antioxidants/) aren't one-size-fits-all, so here's why Dr. Joseph Mercola formulated this ubiquinol supplement to be a perfect fit for you: - Each capsule contains a precise dosage of 100 mg of ubiquinol. - This patented form of Ubiquinol is strategically protected from oxidation. - Hard capsules provide an added layer of protection against oxidation. - High-quality ubiquinol is easily absorbed. - Follows superior standards of safety and quality. Want to make sure that this is the [best antioxidant supplement](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/supplements/antioxidants/) for you? Our certified Wellness Consultants are here to help and available to chat with you today! Send us a message in our LiveChat feature to start a conversation. Our customers ask our Wellness Consultants all sorts of questions. Here are few of the most commonly asked questions about CoQ10 and ubiquinol: Why do we need more CoQ10/ubiquinol as we age? With each passing year, our bodies produce less and less of this crucial antioxidant. That means more oxidative stress and less energy! Instead, we can nourish our bodies with an antioxidant supplement like Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol to maintain our health and vitality!* Is this supplement only for people over the age of 30? Not at all! If you're under the age of 30, Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol is still a great option for you! However, most younger people are able to take a CoQ10 supplement instead of ubiquinol. Their youthful bodies can easily convert CoQ10 into ubiquinol. We suggest that people over the age of thirty take a ubiquinol supplement because it's more absorbable than CoQ10. Can I take other dietary supplements with Dr. Mercola Ubiquinol? Great question! Yes, this antioxidant supplement is a great addition to your daily supplements. We recommend taking it with a meal for best absorption and checking with your physician before starting a new supplement. Suggested Use: Adults, as a dietary supplement, take one (1) capsule daily with a meal. Cautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Consult a physician before taking this product if you are pregnant, nursing, taking any medications, or have a medical condition. Questions? We've got answers! Click the LiveChat button in the lower right hand side of your screen to start talking with one of our Wellness Consultants or [ call one of our stores](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/contact/) to speak with a member of our team. Serving Size: 1 Capsule Servings Per Container: 30 Ingredients: Ubiquinol Other Ingredients: Medium Chain Triglycerides, D-Limonene, Capsule (Fish Gelatin) Licensed osteopathic physician, Dr. Mercola emphasizes the importance of a natural approach to wellness so you can live a healthier life! In his early years of owning a practice, Dr. Mercola treated patients with prescription medications until he noticed its damaging outcomes. When he discovered the flaws in the conventional medical method, he began studying natural and holistic approaches to treat ailments. After seeing impressive successes, he decided he was ready to commit to this form of medicine. In the 1990s, he found that there weren't many suppliers for safe and effective supplements that were up to his standards. That's when he decided to create his own line of products. Now, Dr. Mercola's Mercola Market has developed over 1,000 high quality supplements that can target specific health issues and promote whole-body wellness!
